verse:
यतो वाचो निवर्तन्ते। अप्राप्य मनसा सह। आनन्दं ब्रह्मणो विद्वान्‌। न बिभेति कदाचनेति। तस्यैष एव शारीर आत्मा। यः पूर्वस्य।
तस्माद्वा एतस्मान्मनोमयात्‌। अन्योऽन्तर आत्मा विज्ञानमयः।तेनैष पूर्णः। स वा एष पुरुषविध एव।तस्य पुरुषविधताम्। अन्वयं पुरुषविधः। तस्य श्रद्धैव शिरः।ऋतं दक्षिणः पक्षः।सत्यमुत्तरः पक्षः। योग आत्मा। महः पुच्छं प्रतिष्ठा।तदप्येष श्लोको भवति॥

terms.पुरुषविधताम्‌: being the knower of the person (self)

meaning: Meaning:From where speech retreats along with the mind without attaining Bliss of Brahman (the Supreme Being), the knower of Brahman does not fear at any time. This very body is the soul, which belonged to the previous (birth). Therefore, from this (body) the other inner self, consisting of the mind, is the knower of the self composed of knowledge. By that (knowledge), this (person) is fulfilled. He (the knower) indeed is the knower of the self. His connection (with the self) is the knower of the person (self). His faith is the head. Truth is the right wing. Truth is the north or upper wing. The union with self is the mind. The tail is the support or basis. Even this verse becomes the same.
